kpi_info.title: Incoming 2G to 3G ISHO attempts, e2e
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of all incoming inter system handover attempts from 2G to 3G. All failures caused by ME, MS and network are included
kpi_info.formula:
sum(IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO + IU_FAIL_INTRA_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO +
IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO + IU_FAIL_INTER_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO)

counters from table(s): p_sgsn_iu_mobility_mgmnt
